service.name: Blood Samples Service
service.description: The Blood Sample Service (BSS) is a broker between laboratories and hospitals or family doctors, providing a set of laboratories nearly located to the service user. Contact information of each laboratory and working hours will be presented to the service user.

path.desc: Obtain a list of laboratories in the near of your current place or search for laboratories by name.
View a particular laboratory and obtain details of it.
Obtain and modify the profile of the service user.
Obtain the booking page to add or modify the options the service user booked.
